trans-unit.source: Describes a change in the scrolling state and contains the required arguments for a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollChanged" /> event.
Gets the updated height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> extent.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the updated extent height.
trans-unit.target: 代表更新之範圍高度的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentHeight%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> extent.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the change in extent height.
trans-unit.target: 代表範圍高度變更的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentHeightChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentHeightChange%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> extent.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the updated extent width.
trans-unit.target: 代表更新之範圍寬度的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> extent.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the change in extent width.
trans-unit.target: 表示範圍寬度變更的 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentWidthChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ExtentWidthChange%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in horizontal offset for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the change in horizontal offset for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示的水平位移變更<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.HorizontalChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.HorizontalChange%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated horizontal offset value for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the updated value of the horizontal offset for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 的已更新水平位移值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.HorizontalOffset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.HorizontalOffset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The event handler to invoke, in this case the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler" /> delegate.
The target upon which the <c>genericHandler</c> is invoked.
Performs proper type casting before invoking the type-safe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventHandler" /> delegate
If you provide either the `genericHandler` or `genericTarget` as a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), exceptions are raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提供`genericHandler`或`genericTarget`做為 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，會引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in vertical offset of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the change in vertical offset of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示的垂直位移變更<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.VerticalChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.VerticalChange%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the vertical offset for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the updated vertical offset of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示更新垂直位移<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.VerticalOffset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.VerticalOffset%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the viewport height for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the updated viewport height of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />代表的已更新的檢視區高度<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportHeight%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in value of the viewport height for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the change in vertical viewport height for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 之垂直檢視區高度的變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportHeightChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportHeightChange%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the updated value of the viewport width for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the updated value of the viewport width for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />代表更新的檢視區寬度值<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the change in viewport width of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the change in viewport width for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Double" />表示的檢視區寬度變更<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportWidthChange%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs.ViewportWidthChange%2A>屬性。
